# Blockchain, Digital Assets & Tokenization

## Radically Simple. Enterprise-Grade.

Build transformative solutions for any use case

Build transformative solutions for

  * Financial Services
  * CBDCs
  * ESG & Climate

Try It FreeTalk to an Expert

Trusted by 1000+ Leaders and  
Innovators Across Industries

## Meet the Blockchain Business Cloud

Web3 has never been easier for the enterprise. Our suite of products delivers
out-of-the-box blockchain applications with enterprise-grade security and
scalability—cutting months off development timelines to deliver real business
value on day one.

### Blockchain as a Service

Multi-protocol Industry leading BaaS

### Digital Asset Platform

### CBDC Platform

## Get to Production 10x Faster and Save 90% on Build Time

With 500+ pre-built services and APIs, you can stand up Web3 projects almost
instantly, devoting more time to iteration, customization, and user
experience.

### Chain Configurations

### Protocols & Web3 Tools

### Plug and Play Services

### Choose Your Protocol and Configurations

On Kaleido you can launch an Ethereum, Polygon, Hyperledger Fabric, or Corda
chain in minutes—then deploy our services around your use case.

### Generate Open APIs From Any Smart Contract

Access a library of proven smart contracts or quickly convert your own into
APIs - this is a Web3 platform built to make a developer’s work simpler.

### Talking To a Blockchain Has Never Been Easier

With Event streams, App2App Messaging, Document Exchange, and advanced key
management, we’ve made it easy to communicate on- and off-chain.

Watch a Video Walkthrough →

## Global Leaders Are Driving Production Networks on Kaleido

Enterprise blockchain teams around the globe build on Kaleido to facilitate
trade, democratize finance, streamline systems, create new revenue streams,
and delight their customers.  
  
They choose Kaleido because it is built from the ground up to meet enterprise
requirements with modern cloud scale architecture, always-up resiliency,
elastic performance, and ISO 27k and SOC 2 Type 2 compliance — all backed by
SLAs and 24x7 support options.  
‍

SOC 2 Type 2

ISO 27001, 27017, 27018

consortia

customer experiences

## Why We’re Trusted Around the World

Kaleido’s blockchain platform combines the dramatic simplicity of SaaS with
the performance, security, and scale of an enterprise-grade solution. We go
beyond quick start scripts, templates, and other blockchain-as-a-service
offerings to help you efficiently transform legacy systems.
